summary:
## Twitter: A Quick Summary

Twitter, now called X, is a popular social media site where people share short messages, images, and videos called "tweets." It was created in 2006 and quickly grew to have millions of users. Initially, tweets were limited to 140 characters, but this was later increased to 280.

Elon Musk bought Twitter in 2022 and changed its name to X in 2023. Since then, the platform has faced criticism for spreading misinformation and hate speech. Despite these changes, Twitter remains a major social media platform.
title: Twitter
